title: Do You Need To Follow?
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss Kyler Murray unfollowing the Cardinals on social media, the Saints hiring Dennis Allen and react to the Blazers trading away CJ McCollum.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
